metadata.title: La Chat Portable Electric Nail Drill- Professional Manicure Pedicure E-file Kit with 11 Pieces Changeable Drills And 6 pieces Sand Bands for Shaping, Polishing, Removing Acrylic Gel Nails
metadata.details: {"Brand": "La Chat", "Material": "Aluminum", "Power Source": "Battery Powered", "Package Dimensions": "7.8 x 4.6 x 2.1 inches; 8.78 Ounces", "UPC": "191814483834", "Manufacturer": "junwei"}

categorization.explanation: The product is a nail drill kit which is used for manicure and pedicure. It fits best under the 'Nail Art & Polish' subcategory in 'Foot, Hand & Nail Care' under the main category 'Beauty & Personal Care'.
